snippet: A 12-year-old girl was in critical condition after an assailant broke into the children’s bedroom in Camden, N.J., early Sunday.
abstract: Knife-wielding attacker breaks into a bedroom in Camden, NJ, and slits the throats of two siblings, killing 6-year-old Dominick Andujor and leaving his 12-year-old sister in critical condition; authorities have no explanation for the attack and no arrests have been made.
lead_paragraph: A 12-year-old girl was in critical condition after an assailant broke into the children’s bedroom in Camden, N.J., early Sunday.

headline.seo: Intruder Slits Siblings’ Throats, Killing 6-Year-Old Boy, in Camden, N.J.
headline.main: Siblings’ Throats Slit by Intruder; Boy, 6, Dies
headline.print_headline: Siblings’ Throats Slit by Intruder; Boy, 6, Dies
